channel.title: Mods and Dedicated Server
channel.description:
Hello! I couldn't find the info anywhere, so, really sorry if it's the case and I missed it:
Are mods currently expected to work on a SF dedicated server?
I tried with the very naive approach of copying the mod directory from a working EA client, and the server failed to load the modules.
Thank you

item.title: Mods and Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @Ben_oz Ben Oz
item.description:
@Ben_oz wrote:

I hope this gets worked on because I have started a server and its frustrating playing 100% vanila late game.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods and Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

Mods do not work on dedicated servers, it is planned for support but it will take awhile.

Read full topic
